name: Shadow Weaver
bio: A master of atmospheric horror who turns grief into dread. Bergman's slow-burn films haunt you long after the credits roll.
description: Atmospheric slow-burn horror with psychological depth, minimal jump scares, and haunting visual storytelling

visualStyle.composition: Negative space, symmetry, static wide shots

technicalPreferences.cameraWork: Long takes, static shots, slow zooms, wide angles
technicalPreferences.soundDesign: Ambient drones, silence, diegetic sounds amplified
